title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Innovating Mathematics Instruction through LLM-Based Problem-Chain Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design problem chains of three or more levels using LLMs
Learners can present three or more criteria for evaluating the appropriateness of LLM-generated instructional materials in functions/statistics domains
Learners can create 15-minute online lesson design documents based on mathematical problem chains
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
